block.p: Ma Caridad Paras and Sid Garbanzos are to be married today by the Rev. Thaddeus Grzelak at St. Charles Borromeo Roman Catholic Church in Brooklyn. The Rev. Francis Garbanzos, a Roman Catholic priest and an uncle of the bridegroom, will take part in the ceremony.

The bride, who is known as Cary, graduated from the University of the Phillipines, as did the bridegroom. They did not meet, however, until 1998, when they were introduced at a cocktail party in Manhattan.

Ma Caridad Paras and Sid Garbanzos are to be married today by the Rev. Thaddeus Grzelak at St. Charles Borromeo Roman Catholic Church in Brooklyn. The Rev. Francis Garbanzos, a Roman Catholic priest and an uncle of the bridegroom, will take part in the ceremony.

The bride, who is known as Cary, graduated from the University of the Phillipines, as did the bridegroom. They did not meet, however, until 1998, when they were introduced at a cocktail party in Manhattan.

The bride, 30, is the head lingerie and swimwear designer for Intimately Yours, a manufacturer in Manhattan. She received an associate's degree cum laude in fashion design from the Fashion Institute of Technology. She is a daughter of Teresita Tablante Paras of Angeles City, the Philippines, and the late Jose Paras. Her father was a district attorney for Pam Panga Province in the Philippines. Her mother owns and manages real estate in Angeles.

The bridegroom, 36, is a management consultant for Caduceus, a health-care-related business in Manhattan. He received a master's degree in health-care administration from the New School for Social Research. He is a son of the late Concepcion Yulo Garbanzos and Tomas Garbanzos. His father owned a sugar plantation in Bago, on Negros Island in the Philippines.
